column2: Bvlgari Extreme EDT - 100 ml (For Men)
column14: Amazon.in: Buy Bvlgari Extreme EDT - 100 ml (For Men) Online at Best Price in India | Amazon Beauty Store
column15: Buy Bvlgari Extreme EDT - 100 ml (For Men) at lowest price in India on Amazon.in. Check out Bvlgari Extreme EDT - 100 ml (For Men) reviews  ratings  features  specifications and browse more Beauty products online at best prices on Amazon.in.
column17:
Product Description

His designer shirt is as flawless as his profile as he shrugs into his dinner jacket and offers his arm to the lady. As he leads her into the restaurant the power of his luxury fragrance sweeps through her reiterating the effect of his personality and charm on her. The fragrance connoisseurs at Bvlgari designed Extreme to complement the man he is the potency of his dashing good looks. Heads turn as he strides in and the Eau de Toilette precedes him announcing his arrival. The deep woody notes of the perfume accentuate the slight ruggedness of his personality blurring the line between handsome and feral. The creator of Bvlgari Extreme plays with the crisp cool notes to present you with a fragrance the enamours the senses. Warring accords of spicy coriander herbaceous lavender galbanum light tea juicy grapefruit neroli petit grain and zesty bergamot incite the opening notes into dancing flames. The pure heart notes secrete the accords of spice with nutmeg pepper and cardamom. A slight woodiness colors the heart in the presence of the balsam fir brazilian rosewood and guaiac wood. As the dry down fades away from your person accords of iris sandalwood oakmoss cedar and powdery musk make their presence felt softening the bite of the fragrance. Presented elegantly in a rectangular flacon with simple lines dedicated to minimalism the slight smoky grey of the fragrance is reflected in the dark depths of his unspeaking eyes. The silver stopper lends elegance a touch of class to the fragrance. Dance with the devil and live dangerously with Bvlgari Extreme the fragrance of a man who owns the game.

Successor of the last year's edition Champion is a new fragrance for men Champion Energy which arrives on the market in July 2011. The new fragrance for men will be available in the same flacon as previous edition Champion but composed of white cylindrical body and weights colored in metallic silver. column17:
Product Description

A rare original fragrance the Bvlgari Pour Homme is just another name for sinful temptation. Launched in 1996 this Woody Floral Musk fragrance for the modern urban confident male is a unique design from the house of Bvlgari created by perfumer Jacques Cavallier. Defining its own parameters for masculine sensuality and provocation the Bvlgari Pour Homme flirts with your senses to provide exquisite aromatic pleasure. A unique refreshing fragrance the Bvlgari Pour Homme luxury Eau de Toilette combines style with sophistication and renders a sensational concoction of essentially virile aromas. The grand aromatic opening of the perfume is marked by the subtle and fresh notes of Darjeling Tea and Waterlily. The heart notes that appear next are those of the mesmerizing Guaiac Wood and zesty Black Pepper. The lingering base notes are composed of a bright Amber and Musk leading to a superb sensation of light-hearted delight. Classy and smart the Bvlgari Pour Homme is a fragrance that brings out the ultimate manly charm in you that every woman would find irresistible.

Cool Water Sea Rose launches in 2013 as a new chapter in the saga of love between a woman and the sea.Initial accords include delicate and juicy Japanese Nashi pear which wraps itself around the heart made of sweet floral notes of pink peony and laid on the sensual base of musk.

column17:
Product Description

Launched by the design house of Davidoff in 1988 Cool Water by Davidoff possesses a blend of lavender jasmine oakmoss musk sandalwood. It is recommended for daytime wear. What is a Tester? A Tester is a perfume with no fancy packaging but with the same exact fragrance at an even better price. They are just like the one used to test the perfume in a department store but supplied in a plain box and often have the word tester printed on the bottle. Sometimes they do not come with a cap or box. These items are great for personal use but may not be great as gifts. Our testers are new unopened and have never been sprayed (Testers and unboxed product are exactly the same as the regular perfume except testers usually come in a plain box--with or without a cap. Unboxed products are the perfume or bath product only without the box.)

Product Description

Launched by the design house of Davidoff in 2008 DAVIDOFF ADVENTURE is a men s fragrance that possesses a blend of Woody and spicy with mandarin lemon bergamot black sesame pimento cedar vetiver and white musksWhen applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and in turn the way a scent smells on you. For instance your mood stress level age body chemistry diet and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.
